title: Montclair Hills Retreat with Spacious Master Suite, Views & Deck
posting_body: ['This is a custom built craftsman style home located in the Montclair district of the Oakland Hills.', 'A peaceful, beautifully detailed, spacious, sunny retreat in a garden oasis.', 'The main house is 2 floors of 2,200 square feet with a large Master Bedroom Suite Upstairs and a large comfortable living room, full dining room and large Chef’s Kitchen on the Main Floor.', 'The ground floor is where the second bedroom/guest room is located as well as some basement storage space.', 'Lease Terms:', 'Available: Early September 2022', 'One Year Lease followed by month to month.', 'Unfurnished ( even though photos show it furnished)', 'To move it: First month’s rent +$200 Utilities + $4500 Security Deposit', 'Please bring credit report, recent pay stubs.', 'Tenant Pays $200/month for their part of Utilities,Water/Garbage', '***This is a Non-Smoking Home', "Cat's welcome, small dogs with references and additional deposit negotiable.", '$500 pet deposit.', 'The House Details:', 'The Main floor has an open floor plan with 3 distinct living spaces, lots of natural light and a sun filled deck.', "There is a chef's style kitchen, complete with all stainless steel appliances, double ovens with convection heat, 2 side-by-side dishwashers, a gas stove & grill, refrigerator, all granite counter tops, and a large walk in pantry.", 'A living room/entertainment area with wet bar and copper sink, a 50 inch flat screen tv and 6 surround sound speakers plus a large floor to ceiling stone fireplace and built-in custom cabinetry.', 'The large dining room seats 8 to 10 comfortably and is open to the deck.', 'The entire Second Floor is a Master Bedroom Suite.', 'There is plenty of extra floor space for exercising or lounging or reading near the gas fireplace.', 'The suite has bay views & Mt Tam and western exposure featuring awesome sunsets.', 'There is a 2 person walk-in shower and also a large indoor claw foot tub.', 'There is a large walk-in closet with built-in cabinets, double sinks and a washer/dryer.', 'The ground floor Studio space has its own bathroom/shower unit and small kitchen area.', 'This is the second bedroom/guest room.', 'There is also some basement storage space.', 'Things to Note:', 'There are 42 stairs down to the main house from the street.', 'There is street parking place for 1 cars directly in front of the house.', 'Additional street parking is available as well.', 'There is another part of the lower level of the house that is NOT part of this rental and is a separate one bedroom in-law apartment with a separate entrance.', 'And is rented separately.', 'This unit has their own entrance and its an entirely separate space.', "There is also a cottage in the front garden which is the landlord's unit.", "Even though there are 2 other rentals units on this property, it's unlikely you'll see or even interact with anyone else during your stay.", 'All of the units share the same front stairway but they are all separate distinct units.', 'There are small dogs which also live on this property.', 'Additional House Features:', 'The property is private and secluded.', "When you walk in the front gate you feel like you've entered a private retreat.", 'The entire property is fenced and feels very safe and secure.', 'The house is completely fenced & surrounded by a 1/4 acre of organic gardens with fruit trees, berries and grapes, including raised beds with a large variety of organic veggies, herbs and flowers depending on the season.', 'Check out Wally Dog Farms on FB to see what is growing.', 'You’ll be looking out on the back gardens and partial views of the Bay including Mt Tam.', 'Hawks can be seen circling, hummingbirds love the Chinese lantern in the front garden and figs, lemons, limes and more can be picked off the trees.', 'The Neighborhood', 'We’re on a Quiet cul-de-sac where all of the neighbors know each other and watch out for one another as well.', 'You can walk down the nearby stairs to the village.']
